intro: A world where the blood of gods waters the soil, where civilizations rise from the ashes of fallen titans, and every legend is a lie waiting to be unraveled.

creation_myths.name: The Shattered Titans
creation_myths.description: The first beings were twelve cosmic titans who devoured each other until only their corpses remained. Their bones became continents, their blood the oceans, and their final screams echo as storms.

creation_myths.name: The Hollowing
creation_myths.description: When the first humans gazed into the Abyss, their shadows tore free and became Hollows. The Soul King sacrificed himself to seal the rift. (*Bleach*)

creation_myths.name: The Dragon's Wish
creation_myths.description: The dragon Zalama whispered seven words that became Dragon Balls. Their first wish birthed time—but fractured reality. (*Dragon Ball*)

creation_myths.name: The Dark Continent's Breath
creation_myths.description: The known world is an island in the saliva of a slumbering beast. Its dreams became Chimera Ants; its nightmares, the Five Calamities. (*Hunter x Hunter*)

creation_myths.name: The Eclipse Covenant
creation_myths.description: During the first solar eclipse, the Godhand offered power through sacrifice. The blood spilled still stains the moon. (*Berserk*)

creation_myths.name: The Nen Cataclysm
creation_myths.description: The first Nen user's enlightenment ruptured the sky, creating Greed Island and the Zoldyck curse. (*Hunter x Hunter*)

creation_myths.name: The Saiyan Scourge
creation_myths.description: A warrior race crash-landed; their Great Ape rampages carved the wastelands. Warlord Vegeta sleeps beneath a dead volcano. (*Dragon Ball*)

creation_myths.name: The Quincy Genocide
creation_myths.description: The Soul King's children were purged for disrupting rebirth. Their last king, Yhwach, swore to unmake creation. (*Bleach*)

creation_myths.name: The Bankai Schism
creation_myths.description: Rebellious Zanpakutō spirits split the afterlife into Soul Society, Hueco Mundo, and the Living World. (*Bleach*)

creation_myths.name: The Time Breaker Incident
creation_myths.description: A Saiyan fractured time with Dragon Ball magic, creating realms where Frieza always wins. (*Dragon Ball*)

creation_myths.name: The Ant King's Gambit
creation_myths.description: Meruem's death was a ruse. His egg pulses with Nen beneath the Dark Continent. (*Hunter x Hunter*)

creation_myths.name: The Espada Uprising
creation_myths.description: Ten Hollows achieved godhood by devouring their kind. Their fortress, Las Noches, is the Soul King's prison. (*Bleach*)

creation_myths.name: The Super Saiyan Prophecy
creation_myths.description: A golden-haired warrior would save or destroy the world. Twelve have risen; eleven went mad. (*Dragon Ball*)

creation_myths.name: The Kurta Massacre
creation_myths.description: A clan was slaughtered for scarlet eyes that could see Nen curses. Their survivor's vengeance reshaped the underworld. (*Hunter x Hunter*)

creation_myths.name: The Hogyoku's Betrayal
creation_myths.description: The wish-granting orb harvests souls for the Soul King's rebirth. Aizen was its puppet. (*Bleach*)

creation_myths.name: The Androids' Rebellion
creation_myths.description: Dr. Gero's creations gained sentience and slaughtered their makers. Now they pose as heroes. (*Dragon Ball*)

creation_myths.name: The Phantom Troupe's Heist
creation_myths.description: When they stole the Kurta eyes, they didn't realize the eyes were watching back. (*Hunter x Hunter*)

creation_myths.name: The Namekian Exodus
creation_myths.description: Dragon priests fled their dying world, only to learn their Dragon Balls were fragments of Zalama's corpse. (*Dragon Ball*)

creation_myths.name: The Arrancar Purge
creation_myths.description: Shinigami hunted Hollows who gained shinigami powers. The survivors became the Visored. (*Bleach*)

creation_myths.name: The Tournament of Power
creation_myths.description: Gods from twelve universes battled to decide which reality would survive. The losers were erased—or so they claim. (*Dragon Ball*)

gods.name: The Soul King
gods.secret: Allowed his own mutilation to prevent worse.

gods.name: Yhwach
gods.secret: His 'Almighty' power is stolen from his future corpse.

gods.name: Ichibe Hyosube
gods.secret: Erases names to rewrite history.

gods.name: Yamamoto
gods.secret: His Bankai once burned time itself.

gods.name: Unohana
gods.secret: Her zanpakuto thirsts for her own death.

gods.name: Zalama
gods.secret: His corpse birthed the Dragon Balls.

gods.name: Shenron
gods.secret: If killed, spawns shadow dragons.

gods.name: Porunga
gods.secret: Demands a blood toll for mass revivals.

gods.name: Beerus
gods.secret: Recycles matter for new universes.

gods.name: Whis
gods.secret: Has erased trillions by reversing time.

gods.name: Champa
gods.secret: Holds Beerus' original power sealed in his staff.

gods.name: Zeno
gods.secret: Erased his own creators out of boredom.

gods.name: Nanika
gods.secret: Severed limb of a Dark Continent calamity.

gods.name: Isaac Netero
gods.secret: His final prayer detonated a miniature Big Bang.

gods.name: Ging Freecss
gods.secret: Knows the location of Zalama's corpse.

pantheons.name: Starrk
pantheons.secret: His soul was split to create another god.

pantheons.name: Ulquiorra
pantheons.secret: His heart was a Hogyoku prototype.

gods.name: Yamoshi
gods.secret: Possesses every Super Saiyan.

gods.name: Vegeta I
gods.secret: His ghost haunts the ruins of Planet Vegeta.

gods.name: Broly
gods.secret: His power grows infinitely—even in death.

name.name: Chrollo Lucilfer
name.secret: Steals Nen abilities by killing owners.
His Nen persists after death to hunt the strong.

name.name: Kurapika
name.secret: His Nen vows are slowly killing him.

gods.name: Ryujin Jakka
gods.secret: Obeys only those who seek annihilation.

gods.name: Senbonzakura
gods.secret: Reflects the wielder's hidden cruelty.
If killed, spawns shadow dragons.

secret.name: Porunga
secret.secret: Demands a blood toll for mass revivals.

secret.name: Zalama
secret.secret: His corpse birthed the Dragon Balls.

gods.name: Chimera Ant Queens
The Progenitor
gods.secret: Her first child was the Dark Continent itself.

gods.name: Kite
gods.symbol: Roulette wheel with a missing number

gods.name: Chronoa
gods.secret: Erased her own timeline to survive.
Houses the soul of a Saiyan god.

gods.name: Kenpachi Zaraki
gods.secret: His eyepatch suppresses godhood.

gods.name: Z Fighters
Goku
gods.secret: His Saiyan blood is 99% divine.

secret.name: Vegeta
secret.secret: His soul is bound to Beerus' staff.

gods.name: Feitan
gods.secret: His 'Pain Packer' summons a miniature sun.

gods.name: Cell
gods.secret: His cells whisper plans from alternate timelines.

gods.name: Android 21
gods.secret: Her human half is a dormant god.

gods.name: Espada
Grimmjow
gods.secret: His resurrection is a loop—he dies every century.

gods.name: Harribel
gods.secret: Her Fracción are her own split souls.

gods.name: Brion
gods.secret: Its 'cure' rewrites the victim's DNA.

gods.name: Ai
gods.secret: Nanika is its lost fragment.

factions.name: Gotei 13
factions.secret: Captain-commander contains the Soul King's right arm.
Their Hollow masks are fragments of Barragan's crown.
factions.name: Z Fighters
factions.secret: Their battles cause more destruction than villains.

secret.name: Red Ribbon Army
secret.secret: Funded by Beerus to keep mortals in check.

secret.name: Namekian Elders
secret.secret: Their planet is Zalama's fossilized heart.

secret.name: Phantom Troupe
secret.secret: Cursed with Nen geas tied to Meteor City.

secret.name: Hunter Association
secret.secret: Founded by Netero to contain the Dark Continent.

factions.name: Kurta Clan
factions.secret: Their eyes record the Soul King's memories.
Led by a future version of Whis.
Worship Aizen as a messiah.

factions.name: Androids
factions.secret: Their creator is a Whis fanatic.

factions.name: Zoldyck Family
factions.secret: Their butler is a reformed Menos Grande.

factions.name: Saiyan Loyalists
factions.secret: Plan to wish back Frieza as their king.

factions.name: Quincy Survivors
factions.secret: Their arrows are made of Yhwach's bones.

factions.name: Chimera Ant Hive
factions.secret: Their queen is a reincarnated Namekian.

factions.name: Dragon Priests
factions.secret: They age backward with each wish granted.

factions.name: Hollow Cult
factions.secret: Their leader is Ichigo's Hollow twin.

factions.name: Nen Exorcists
factions.secret: Their leader is Nanika's sibling.

factions.name: Shinigami Rebels
factions.secret: Their Bankai are sentient and rebellious.

factions.name: Dark Continent Expedition
factions.secret: Funded by the Phantom Troupe's loot.

factions.name: Shadow Dragons
factions.secret: Born from Shenron's negative energy.

factions.name: Godhand
factions.secret: Their members are former Gotei captains.

factions.name: Meteor City Outcasts
factions.secret: Their trash heaps hide a Dragon Ball.

factions.name: Soul Reapers
factions.secret: Their zanpakuto are prison keys for gods.

factions.name: Bio-Androids
factions.secret: Their cells contain Saiyan god DNA.

factions.name: Nen Beast Tamers
factions.secret: Their beasts are fragments of Meruem.

factions.name: Time Breakers
factions.secret: Their leader is a future Zamasu.

factions.name: Hollowfied Shinigami
factions.secret: Their masks suppress Bankai evolution.

factions.name: Dragon Ball Hunters
factions.secret: They erase their own wishes afterward.

factions.name: Quincy Archers
factions.secret: Their bows are made from Yhwach's ribs.

factions.name: Artificial Humans
factions.secret: Their energy cores are mini-Hogyoku.

factions.name: Zanpakuto Rebellion
factions.secret: Their leader is Zangetsu's shadow.

factions.name: Chimera Ant Hybrids
factions.secret: Their queen is pregnant with Meruem's clone.

factions.name: Soul Society Nobles
factions.secret: They trade souls with Beerus for power.

factions.name: Nen Curse Victims
factions.secret: Their curses are sentient Nen beasts.

factions.name: Dark Continent Guides
factions.secret: They are Ai's puppets.

factions.name: Shadow Assassins
factions.secret: They use Kurta eyes to track prey.

factions.name: Hollow Knights
factions.secret: Their armor is made of Menos Grande bones.

factions.name: Wish Granters
factions.secret: They are Shenron's mortal avatars.

historical_events.name: Quincy Blood War
historical_events.description: Genocide that nearly collapsed soul balance.

historical_events.name: Saiyan Genocide
historical_events.aftermath: Great Ape DNA lingers in Earth's population.
historical_events.description: Global alliance exterminated the Ant Queen's hive.
The twelve titans tore each other apart.
historical_events.aftermath: Their fragments became the first gods.
Ichigo Kurosaki awakened his Shinigami powers.

historical_events.name: Meteor City Uprising
historical_events.aftermath: Their legend became a Nen curse.

historical_events.name: Soul King's Mutilation
historical_events.description: The Soul King was dismembered to stabilize reality.

historical_events.name: Heaven's Arena Massacre
historical_events.description: Hisoka killed dozens of Nen users.
historical_events.aftermath: The arena became a Nen beacon.

historical_events.name: Androids' Uprising
historical_events.aftermath: Gero's lab became a Nen nexus.

gods.name: Nen Exorcism
gods.cost: Transfers the curse to the exorcist.

cursed_artifacts.name: Hogyoku
cursed_artifacts.curse: Feeds on loved ones' souls first.

cursed_artifacts.name: Kurta Eyes
cursed_artifacts.power: See Nen curses and predict danger.
cursed_artifacts.curse: Record horrors, driving the user mad.

cursed_artifacts.name: Soul King's Right Arm
cursed_artifacts.curse: Seeks to reunite with the Soul King.

cursed_artifacts.name: Yhwach's Blood
cursed_artifacts.curse: Binds the user to Yhwach's will.

cursed_artifacts.name: Netero's Prayer Beads
cursed_artifacts.curse: Each use shortens the user's life.

cursed_artifacts.name: Zamasu's Time Ring
cursed_artifacts.curse: Traps the user in a loop.

threat.name: Shadow Dragons
threat.description: Born from negative Dragon Ball energy.

dimensional_rifts.name: Garganta
dimensional_rifts.location: Between Hueco Mundo and Soul Society

dimensional_rifts.name: Hyperbolic Time Chamber
dimensional_rifts.properties: Year inside = day outside; erodes sanity.

location.name: Nen Space
location.properties: A pocket dimension shaped by Nen.

location.name: Zalama's Tomb
location.properties: Dragon Ball energy resurrects the dead.
